title.rendered: Bangladesh vs Ireland, 1st ODI: Fantasy Team, Probable Playing XIs, Pitch Report & Fantasy Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Mehidy Hasan Miraz suffered an injury in training and might miss the clash.

Bangladesh: Tamim Iqbal (c), Litton Das, Najmul Hossain Shanto, Mushfiqur Rahim (wk), Shakib Al Hasan, Afif Hossain, Mehidy Hasan Miraz/Nasum Ahmed, Taskin Ahmed, Ebadot Hossain, Hasan Mahmud, Mustafizur Rahman

Ireland: Paul Stirling, Stephen Doheny, Andy Balbirnie (c), Harry Tector, Gareth Delany, George Dockrell, Curtis Campher, Lorcan Tucker (wk), Andy McBrine, Mark Adair, Graham Hume

Pitch Report

Venue: Sylhet International Cricket Stadium

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 339

2nd innings average score: 254

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 100%

Batting 2nd: —

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Tamim Iqbal has enjoyed piling on runs in Sylhet. He has scored two centuries and a fifty in four matches to aggregate 391 runs. He is also Bangladesh’s top run-getter against Ireland: 508 runs at 56.

Litton Das’ venue numbers aren’t any less. He has scored 334 runs, including a high score of 176, in four matches. In the only game he played against Ireland, he scored 76.

Paul Stirling has scored 197 runs at 39 against Bangladesh.

Harry Tector made it to the Best11 in seven of eight games since 2022. He has registered three centuries and four half-centuries to aggregate 560 runs.

Mark Adair and Andy McBrine have scalped 24 wickets between them at a strike rate of 32 in the last eight matches. In addition, they can generate valuable points with the bat: Adair has been dismissed only once in five innings, while McBrine has scored 227 runs at 45.

Shakib Al Hasan has scored 141 runs and picked six wickets in three ODIs this year. In the last six matches at home, he has 221 runs and 15 wickets.

Najmul Hossain Shanto looked solid in the recently concluded series against England, scoring two fifties in low-scoring matches.

Openers have scored four centuries and a fifty in the last three matches at the venue, while pacers have scalped 60% of the wickets.

Ready with your team? Download the My11Circle fantasy app and start playing now!
